description:
App development is booming. This course is designed to teach anyone how to take no more than $89 and literally turn it in into an App Building empire. I teach you how to make money in a very short period of time by offering small businesses their very own iphone/android application. You will learn the following:

    ·Who needs APPS? (These 7 industries, for starters!)

    ·How to BUILD the apps. (Do-it-yourself or Outsource everything…your choice.)

    ·How to find clients. (There’s an endless supply, if you do it right! I show you how.)

    ·How to contact the right person and SELL successfully! (I even give you a complete Sales Scripts you can use that guarantee success!)

    ·How to use various business models to assure your success. (Three to choose from.)

    ·How to get PAID. (You’ll be rolling in the dough, once you know HOW.)

    ·The one crucial factor you can’t afford to get WRONG. (But almost everyone does.)

You get step-by-step guidelines and easy-to-follow instructions on exactly what to do and how to do it. No stone is left unturned. Everything that you will need in order to succeed in this most profitable endeavor, is provided. I can assure that there is no one else in the world teaching this method. In less than 2 hours you will be equipped with the knowledge and know how to build a full blown, lucrative, App empire, and you'll learn how to do so on a shoestring budget.
title: App Development: Tutorial for Building Apps for Businesses
